query.statement: SELECT B.POSID, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.UDATE,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.UDATE,1,4)||'-' ||SUBSTR(A.UDATE,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.UDATE,7,2) END AS UDATE , CASE WHEN VALUE(A.UTIME,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.UTIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(A.UTIME,3,2) END AS UTIME, VALUE(A.BIGO,'') AS BIGO, A.CATE, CASE WHEN A.CATE = 'L' THEN '·¹ÀÌ¾Æ¿ô' WHEN A.CATE = 'R' THEN '·»´õ¸µ' WHEN A.CATE = 'D' THEN '½Ã¹æ¼­' ELSE '' END AS GUBUN, CASE WHEN A.UDATE = '' OR A.UDATE = '00000000' THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(A.CDATE, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.CDATE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.CDATE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.CDATE, 7, 2) END || ' ' || CASE WHEN VALUE(A.CTIME, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.CTIME, 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.CTIME, 3, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.CTIME, 5, 2) END ELSE CASE WHEN VALUE(A.UDATE, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.UDATE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.UDATE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.UDATE, 7, 2) END || ' ' || CASE WHEN VALUE(A.UTIME, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.UTIME, 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.UTIME, 3, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.UTIME, 5, 2) END END UDATE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTPDF AS A ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.POSID = #POSID# AND A.CATE IN ('', 'L') FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
